name: 霜晶狐
description: 毛发如冰晶般闪耀的小狐狸，呼出的气息会瞬间结霜。即使在暴风雪中也能保持温暖。

features: 雪白的毛发带有冰蓝色光泽
尾巴尖端结着永不融化的冰晶

image_prompts.design: A small arctic fox kit with snow-white fur that shimmers with ice-blue light. Never-melting ice crystals on tail tip, snowflake patterns inside ears, eyes clear as frozen lakes. Low poly style with faceted geometric surfaces, sharp edges on ice crystals, ink sketch texture on fur patterns, non-reflective surface with matte white and ice blue tones, cute and resilient.
